data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Ajmer to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ajmer, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Ajmer, Rajasthan, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Ajmer, Rajasthan, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Ajmer access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Ajmer, Rajasthan, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Brahmin Chaubisa people.
Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the county of Ajmer, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Ajmer, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Ajmer. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

location.name: Ajmer
location.people_groups_list: Kalbelia, Rajput (Hindu traditions), Brahmin Mewada, Sargara, Santia (Hindu traditions)
